name: Moonbases
overview: Moonbases is a real-time strategy game set in 2075. Two rival corporations, Sigma Corporation and Omicron Incorporated, after having mined the Moon for two decades, are now fighting over mining rights. Sigma Corporation has mounted a surprise lunar attack against the unprepared Omicron Moon bases. You play as the commander of either Sigma Corporation or Omicron Incorporated. Your role is to safeguard the company's future by taking control of the company's armed forces and guide them into battle against the enemy. You will manage resource extraction, base expansion and maintenance (5 structures available), and units construction, maintenance and deployment (8 units available). The game offers 20 single player missions divided into 2 campaigns. Two player competitive gameplay is supported via serial cable or modem.
